trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2017 common installation issues if running Windows 7, try installing Service Pack 1.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2017 common installation issues if running Windows 7, try installing Service Pack 1.

trans-unit.source: This version of Windows is not supported. If you're running Windows 7, try installing Service Pack 1
trans-unit.target: This version of Windows is not supported. If you're running Windows 7, try installing Service Pack 1

trans-unit.source: When attempting to install Visual Studio, you receive the message: "This Version of Windows is not supported.
trans-unit.target: When attempting to install Visual Studio, you receive the message: "This Version of Windows is not supported.

trans-unit.source: If you are running Windows 7, try installing Service Pack 1".
trans-unit.target: If you are running Windows 7, try installing Service Pack 1".

trans-unit.source: The minimum operating system requirement for Visual Studio is Windows 7 with Service Pack 1 (or higher).
trans-unit.target: The minimum operating system requirement for Visual Studio is Windows 7 with Service Pack 1 (or higher).

trans-unit.source: You can download and install SP1 for Windows 7 from Microsoft.com for free.
trans-unit.target: You can download and install SP1 for Windows 7 from Microsoft.com for free.

trans-unit.source: Confirm that SP1 is installed by following these steps:
trans-unit.target: Confirm that SP1 is installed by following these steps:

trans-unit.source: 1. Click Start, right-click Computer, and then click Properties.
trans-unit.target: 1. Click Start, right-click Computer, and then click Properties.

trans-unit.source: • Check the Windows edition section: If Service Pack 1 is listed, Windows 7 SP1 is already installed on your computer.
trans-unit.target: • Check the Windows edition section: If Service Pack 1 is listed, Windows 7 SP1 is already installed on your computer.

trans-unit.source: Launch the Visual Studio installer again.
trans-unit.target: Launch the Visual Studio installer again.
